sentence.text: The subcapsular cell adhesion mediated by integrin-forming tumor was composed of poorly differentiated tumor cells arranged in small vague glandular or slit-lumen nests, and focally fused or anastomosing large trabecular patterns within the prominent fibrotic stroma.

The tumor cells with immunoreactivity to CK7, CK19, Cam5.2, biological_process, fatty acid beta-oxidation using acyl-CoA dehydrogenase, protein polyubiquitination, MOC-31 and AE1/AE3, supported a diagnosis of intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma.

entity.text: fatty acid beta-oxidation using acyl-CoA dehydrogenase
